worksComp.title: How 1good Works
worksComp.subTitle: A Simple Process to Connect Freelancers and Clients Seamlessly

worksData.title: Post Your Project
worksData.description: Start by sharing your project needs. Fill out a quick form with details like the scope, budget, and timeline, and let our platform find the right freelancers for you.

worksData.title: Get Proposals
worksData.description: Freelancers will review your project and submit tailored proposals. Browse through their offers, including their rates and timelines, to find the best match for your needs.

worksData.title: Choose Your Freelancer
worksData.description: Compare proposals and select the freelancer who fits your vision. Review their profiles and past feedback to make an informed decision, then hire with confidence.

worksData.title: Work Together
worksData.description: Collaborate smoothly with your freelancer using our AI-generated project briefs and instant contracts. Stay in sync through our dashboard and ensure clarity at every step.

worksData.title: Review the Work
worksData.description: Once the freelancer submits their work, review the deliverables to ensure they meet your expectations. Request revisions if needed, or approve the project to move forward.

worksData.title: Finalize Payment
worksData.description: After approval, funds are released from Escrow to the freelancer. Enjoy secure, hassle-free payments that protect both parties every time.
